metadata.title: How It Works | Music Manager
metadata.description: Discover how Music Manager helps you organize and manage your musical journey effectively.

hero.title: How It Works
hero.subtitle: A simple and effective way to manage your musical journey

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your music career

organization.title: Smart Organization
organization.description: Keep all your musical projects, contacts, and opportunities in one place. Our intuitive system helps you stay organized and focused on what matters most.

collaboration.title: Easy Collaboration
collaboration.description: Connect with other musicians, share projects, and collaborate seamlessly. Our platform makes it easy to work together and grow your network.

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your musical growth, track your achievements, and set goals for your career. Stay motivated with clear progress indicators.

opportunities.title: Opportunity Management
opportunities.description: Never miss a chance to showcase your talent. Keep track of auditions, gigs, and other opportunities in one organized place.

process.title: Getting Started
process.subtitle: Three simple steps to begin your journey

signup.title: Create Your Account
signup.description: Sign up for free and set up your musician profile. It only takes a few minutes to get started.

setup.title: Set Up Your Workspace
setup.description: Organize your projects, add your contacts, and customize your dashboard to match your needs.

start.title: Start Managing
start.description: Begin tracking your musical journey, connect with other musicians, and take control of your career.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our community of musicians and start managing your musical journey today.
